tool.name: 1_create_conf
tool.description: : Create configuration file and chromosome tab file for Scaffremodler

param.name: tool
param.label: Mapping tool

param.name: source
param.label: Will you select a reference genome from your history or use a built-in index?
param.help: Built-ins were indexed using default options. See `Indexes` section of help below
param.option: Use a genome from the history and build index

param.name: index
param.label: Select reference genome
param.help: If your genome of interest is not listed, contact the South Green team

validator.message: No indexes are available for the selected input dataset

param.name: own_file
param.label: Select reference genome

param.name: q1
param.label: Mate1 fastq file

param.name: q2
param.label: Mate2 fastq file

param.name: orient
param.label: The upstream/downstream mate orientation for valid paired-end alignment against the forward reference strand

param.name: qual
param.label: Fastq file quality encoding 33 or 64

param.name: mini
param.label: minimum good fragment length

param.name: maxi
param.label: maximum good fragment length

param.name: index
param.label: Create index if reference not indexed

param.name: rmindex
param.label: Remove index

param.name: mini_dis
param.label: Minimal distance between mate to keep discordant mate (should be higher than 2 fold expected insert)

param.name: mult_max_cov
param.label: Multiplicator of median coverage for maximal median coverage to keep a zone

param.name: mult_min_cov
param.label: Multiplicator of median coverage for maximal median coverage to keep a zone

param.name: min_zone
param.label: Minimal number of covered sites in a zone to be considered

param.name: min_gap
param.label: Maximal number of contiguous uncovered sites in a zone to be considered as a single zone

param.name: thread
param.label: Thread number used for mapping

param.name: msd
param.label: Multiplicator of standard deviation for discordant zone identification

param.name: max_dist_merge
param.label: Maximal distance between two discordant zone to merge

param.name: YiS
param.label: Y-intercept of the linear function for zone size that will give the first component of product giving the score

param.name: MiS
param.label: Multiplicator of median insert size for calculating minimal zone size for which the first component of product giving the score will be maximal

param.name: YiC
param.label: Y-intercept of the linear function for coverage that will give the second component of product giving the score

param.name: MiC
param.label: Multiplicator of median coverage for calculating minimal zone coverage for which the second component of product giving the score will be maximal

param.name: min_score
param.label: minimal score for a discordant zone to be identified as passed (0 to 100)

param.name: ploid
param.label: Multiplicator for coverage variation detection in SV identification (ex : If homozygous duplication expected in diploid: expected = coverage + coverage*1; if heterozygous duplication expected in diploid => expected = coverage + coverage*0.5). Choose a value lower than the expected one

param.name: restimate
param.label: Re-estimate --mini and --maxi parameters
